pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast Computation of Romano-Wolf Corrected p-Values for Linear Regression Models // Fast Routines to Compute Romano-Wolf corrected p-Values (Romano and Wolf (2005a) DOI:10.1198/016214504000000539, Romano and Wolf (2005b) DOI:10.1111/j.1468-0262.2005.00615.x) for objects of type 'fixest' and 'fixest_multi' from the 'fixest' package via a wild (cluster) bootstrap.
